channel.title: Monsters and Items on
channel.description: Recent content in Monsters and Items on

item.title: !Enchanted Weapons
item.description: Improving the Weapon To improve your weapon, you’ll be given milestones you need to complete. Upon each milestone, you’ll be given a choice between two upgrades.

item.title: Hookshot
item.description: This magic weapon is a favorite among infiltrators. Its firing mechanism has no string, unlike other crossbows. Instead, this weapon can only be loaded with rope.
